formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the OpenStack connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Tenant ID:
formElement.documentation: ID of the tenant to use.

formElement.label: Flavor:
formElement.documentation: An existing flavor in OpenStack to use.

formElement.label: Security Group(s):
formElement.documentation: Names of the security groups in which to create the OpenStack instances. Enter multiple values on a new line.

formElement.label: Availability Zone:
formElement.documentation: The availability zone in which to launch the server.

formElement.label: Customization script:
formElement.documentation: Configuration information or scripts to execute upon launch of the instance.

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: Location where the output properties will be saved. If not specified, will default to '/myJob/OpenStack/deployed'.

formElement.label: Resource Pool:
formElement.documentation: If you would like to add Commander resources for each OpenStack instance being created, enter the Commander pool name for the new resources. If left blank no resource will be created.

formElement.label: Resource workspace:
formElement.documentation: If you specify a resource pool name, this is the workspace that will be assigned to the created resources.
